fields.description: After another friendly ship at range 0-1 performs an action, you may spend 1 [Energy]. If you do, it removes 1 orange or red token, or recovers 1 [Shield].
fields.ai_description: After another friendly ship at range 0-1 performs an action, you may spend 1 [Energy]. If you do, it removes 1 orange or red token, or recovers 1 [Shield].

fields.name: Bright Hope
fields.description:
You can [Reinforce] only for [Full Front Arc].

While you defend, if you are reinforced and the attacker is in your [Full Front Arc], you may roll 1 additional defense die.
fields.ai_description:
You can [Reinforce] only for [Full Front Arc].

While you defend, if you are reinforced and the attacker is in your [Full Front Arc], you may roll 1 additional defense die.

fields.name: Damage Control Team
fields.description:
Before you engage, you may spend 1 or more [Energy] to flip that many of your Offline upgrade cards.

Action: Spend 1 or more [Energy] to repair that many of your faceup Ship damage cards.
fields.ai_description:
Before you engage, you may spend 1 or more [Energy] to flip that many of your Offline upgrade cards.

Action: Spend 1 or more [Energy] to repair that many of your faceup Ship damage cards.

fields.name: Targeting Coordinator
fields.ai_description: Action: You may spend 1 [Energy] to choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2. Acquire a Target Lock, and then pass the lock on to that friendly ship.

fields.name: Comms Booster
fields.ai_description: Action: Spend 1 [Energy] to remove all Stress tokens from a friendly ship at range 0-1.

fields.name: Experimental Scanners
fields.description: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

fields.name: Comms Shuttle
fields.description: While you are docked, your carrier ship gains [Coordinate]. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a [Coordinate] action.

fields.name: Sensor Blindspot
fields.ai_description: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0-1, do not apply the range 0-1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.

fields.name: Tail Gun
fields.description: When you have a docked ship, you have a primary [Rear Arc] weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary [Front Arc] attack value.

fields.name: Broadside Batteries
fields.description: You can acquire locks and perform primary attacks at range 1-4.

fields.name: Locked and Loaded
fields.description: While you are docked, after your carrier ship performs a primary [Front Arc] or [Turret] attack, it may perform a bonus [Rear Arc] primary attack.

fields.name: R2-D2 (Agility 0)
fields.description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: R2-D2  (Agility 1)
fields.description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: R2-D2 (Agility 3)
fields.description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: "Chopper"
fields.description:
Action: Spend 1 non-recurring [Charge] from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield.

Action: Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring [Charge] on an equipped upgrade.

fields.name: R5 Astromech
fields.description:
Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to repair 1 facedown damage card.

Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

fields.name: R5-D8
fields.description:
Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to repair 1 facedown damage card.

Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

fields.name: R2 Astromech (Agility 0)
fields.description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: R2 Astromech (Agility 1)
fields.description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: R2 Astromech (Agility 3)
fields.description: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: Jamming Beam
fields.description: Attack [Front Arc] 3, Range 1-3: If this attack hits, all [Hit] and [Critical Hit] results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

fields.name: Tractor Beam
fields.description: Attack [Front arc] 3, Range 1-3: If this attack hits, all [Hit] and [Critical Hit] results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

fields.name: Synced Laser Cannons
fields.description: Attack [Front Arc] 3, Range 2-3: If you are calculating, the defender does not apply the range bonus.

fields.name: Jyn Erso
fields.description: If a friendly ship at range 0-3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

fields.name: Kanan Jarrus
fields.description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

fields.name: Arvel Crynyd
fields.description: You can perform primary attacks at range 0.  If you would fail a Boost action by overlapping another ship, resolve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead.

fields.name: Jake Farrell
fields.description: After you perform a Barrel Roll or Boost action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship may perform a Focus action.

fields.name: Cassian Andor
fields.description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

fields.name: Ahsoka Tano
fields.description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-2 and spend 2 [Force]. That ship may perform an action, even while stressed.

fields.name: Airen Cracken
fields.description: After you perform an attack, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. That ship may perform an action, treating it as red.

fields.name: Braylen Sramm
fields.description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

fields.name: Ten Numb
fields.description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 stress token to change all of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit]  results.

fields.name: Ezra Bridger
fields.description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force]  to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

fields.name: Wedge Antilles
fields.description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

fields.name: Shara Bey
fields.description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

fields.name: Sabine Wren
fields.description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the enemy's [Front Arc], you may change 1 of your results to an [Evade] or [Hit]  result.

fields.name: Hera Syndulla
fields.description: While another friendly ship at range 1-2 defends or performs an attack, during a Modify Dice step, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens, evade tokens, or locks to that ship.

fields.name: Derek Klivian
fields.description: After you acquire or spend a lock, you may remove 1 red token from yourself.

fields.name: Evaan Verlaine
fields.description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship rolls 1 additional defense die while defending until the end of the round

fields.name: Norray Wexley
fields.description: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

fields.name: "Dutch" Vander
fields.description: After you perform the [Lock] action, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship may acquire a lock on the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.

fields.name: Horton Salm
fields.description: While you perform an attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender.

fields.name: Arliz Hadrassian
fields.description:
While you perform a [Front Arc] attack, if you are damaged, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

While you defend, if you are damaged, you must change 1 of your [Focus] results to a blank result.

fields.name: Drea Renthal
fields.description: While a friendly non-limited ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

fields.name: Kavil
fields.description: While you perform a non-[Front Arc] attack, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Leema Kai
fields.description: Before you engage, if you are not in any enemy ship's [Front Arc], you may acquire a lock on an enemy ship in your [Full Front Arc].

fields.name: Padric
fields.description: After a friendly device that you have locked detonates, each enemy ship at range 0-1 of that device gains 1 strain token.

fields.name: Netrem Pollard
fields.description: After you barrel roll, you may choose 1 friendly ship that is not stressed at range 0-1. That ship gains 1 stress token, then you rotate 180 degrees.

fields.name: Gina Moonsong
fields.description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you must transfer 1 of your stress tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-2.

fields.name: Biggs Darklighter
fields.description: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 matching result.

fields.name: Kullbee Sperado
fields.description: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may flip your equipped [Configuration] upgrade card.

fields.name: Leevan Tenza
fields.description: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may perform a red [Evade] action.

fields.name: Luke Skywalker
fields.description: After you become the defender (before dice are rolled), you may recover 1 [Force].

fields.name: Edrio Two Tubes
fields.description: Before you activate, if you are focused, you may perform an action.

fields.name: Thane Kyrell
fields.description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Focus], [Hit], or [Critical Hit] result to look at the defender's facedown damage cards, choose 1 and expose it.

fields.name: Garven Dreis
fields.description: After you spend a focus token, you may chose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

fields.name: Jek Porkins
fields.description: After you receive a stress token, you may roll 1 attack die to remove it. On a [Hit] result, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

fields.name: Wedge Antilles
fields.description: While you perform an attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

fields.name: Lieutenant Blount
fields.description: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: "Leebo"
fields.description: After you defend or perform an attack, if you spent a calculate token, gain 1 calculate token.

fields.name: Dash Rendar
fields.description: While you move, you ignore obstacles.

fields.name: Han Solo
fields.description: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0-1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

fields.name: Leia Organa
fields.description: After a friendly ship fully executes a red maneuver, if it is at range 0-3, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token or recovers 1 [Force].

fields.name: Lando Calrissian
fields.description: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship may perform an action.

fields.name: Chewbacca
fields.description: Before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 [Charge] to be dealt the card facedown instead.

fields.name: Kanan Jarrus
fields.description: While a friendly ship in your firing arc defends, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

fields.name: Hera Syndulla
fields.description: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

fields.name: "Chopper"
fields.description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0 gains 2 jam tokens.

fields.name: Alexsandr Kallus
fields.description: While you defend, if the attacker modified any attack dice, you may roll 1 additional defense die.

fields.name: Benthic Two Tubes
fields.description: After you perform a [Focus] action, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship at range 1-2.

fields.name: Bodhi Rook
fields.description: Friendly ships can acquire target locks onto objects at range 0-3 of any friendly ship.

fields.name: Heff Tobber
fields.description: After an enemy executes a maneuver, if it is at range 0, you may perform an action.

fields.name: K-2SO
fields.description: After you gain a stress token, gain 1 calculate token.

fields.name: Magva Yarro
fields.description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, the attacker cannot reroll more than 1 attack die.

fields.name: Saw Gerrera
fields.description: While a damaged friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack, it may reroll 1 attack die.

fields.name: AP-5
fields.description: While you coordinate, if you chose a ship with exactly 1 stress token, it can perform actions.

fields.name: Ezra Bridger
fields.description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade]/[Hit] results.

fields.name: Fenn Rau
fields.description: Before an enemy ship in your firing arc engages, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship cannot spend tokens to modify dice while it performs an attack this phase.

fields.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
fields.description: While you defend, [Critical Hit] results are neutralized before [Hit] results.

fields.name: Miranda Doni
fields.description: While you perform a primary attack, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or, if you are not shielded, you may roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: Esege Tuketu
fields.description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends or performs an attack, it may spend your focus tokens as if that ship has them.

fields.name: Jan Ors
fields.description: While a friendly ship in your firing arc performs a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship may roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Kanan Jarrus
fields.description: While you or a ship in your [Turret Arc] defends, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

fields.name: Kyle Katarn
fields.description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship in your firing arc.

fields.name: Gavin Darklighter
fields.description: While a friendly ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], the attacker may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

fields.name: Corran Horn
fields.description: At initiative 0, you may perform a bonus primary attack against an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc]. If you do, at the start of the next Planning Phase, gain 1 disarm token.

fields.name: Shara Bey
fields.description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

fields.name: Norra Wexley
fields.description: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

fields.name: Ibtisam
fields.description: After you fully execute a maneuver , if you are stressed, you may roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or a [Critical Hit] result, remove one stress token.

fields.name: Garven Dreis
fields.description: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

fields.name: Ezra Bridger
fields.description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

fields.name: Hera Syndulla
fields.description: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

fields.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
fields.description: While you defend, [Critical Hit] results are neutralized before [Hit] results.

fields.name: Sabine Wren
fields.description: Before you activate, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

fields.name: Wullffwarro
fields.description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are damaged, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Lowhhrick
fields.description: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 becomes the defender, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, that ship gains 1 evade token.
